name: Rocket Rider (Sudipto Show)
description:
I suggest you to download the "Rocket Rider.apk" file and play through your Android device.

HOW TO INSTALL 

On Windows: 

1) Download the file "Rocket Rider_setup_(x86).exe" (click the "download now" on this page)

2) Run "Rocket Rider_setup_(x86).exe". Go through the install process. Create a desktop icon and you are done.

Or,

1) Download the file "Rocket Rider.rar" (click the "download now" on this page)

2) Right click on the downloaded zip and "Extract All" to a folder.

3) Enter the new folder and run "Rocket Rider.exe"

On Android:

1) Download the file "Rocket Rider.apk" (click the "download now" on this page)

2) Tap on "Rocket Rider.apk" and install the game.
